```{r data generation scatterplotbesd, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(tidyverse)
library(brand.yml)
library(exams)
N <- sample(50:500, 1)
rho <- 0.6
data <-
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(N),
    y = rho * x + sqrt(1 - rho^2) * rnorm(N)
  )

besd <- function(r) {
  tibble::tibble(
    Gruppe = c("Treatment", "Kontrolle"),
    Erfolg = c(0.5 + r/2, 0.5 - r/2),
    Misserfolg = c(0.5 - r/2, 0.5 + r/2)
  )
}
````
